name: Hard Season Ten of "Cheers" Quiz / Test | 'Cheers'- Season 10 | 25 Questions

questions.text: Compete the line "If we're gonna make a baby, I'm gonna need my _____________."
questions.explanation:
Johnny.

	Sam and Rebecca are trying to have a baby, but Sam is nervous about it and therefore not able to perform. He says this line when he wants to talk to Frasier. His excuse for leaving Rebecca is to go get his Johnny Mathias record.

questions.text: When Cliff tells everyone how he imagined they'd all die, how does he tell Frasier he'd die?
questions.explanation:
He doesn't say.

	Cliff is about to tell Frasier, but Frasier tells him he doesn't want to know. Cliff replies "You bet you don't."

questions.text: What does Madame Lazora tell Carla?
options: You have no future in this business.
questions.explanation:
I'm a complete fraud.

	Georgia Brown Madame played Lazora. She died about a year and a half after this episode aired due to complications during surgery on an intestinal block.

questions.text: Who does Lilith say is the only person who has a right to be in her house?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Lilith: "Only one person has a right to be here." Frasier: "Me?" Lilith: "Don't bet on it mister."

questions.text: What does Ma Clavin tell Cliff he may have since he's allergic to chocolate?
questions.explanation:
graham crackers.

	Francis Sternhagen, who played Ma Clavin, was also in the movie "Sibling Rivalry" which starred Kirstie Alley, who played Rebecca Howe.

questions.text: Who plays Carla's daughter, Seraphina?
questions.explanation:
Leah Remini.

	Risa Littman played Anne Marie Tortelli. Sabrina Weiner played Lucinda Tortelli. Jackie Swanson played Kelly Gaines. Leah Remini played Stacey Carosi on some of the episodes of "Saved by the Bell".

questions.text: In "Bar Wars V: The Final Judgement," does Gary die?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Everyone in Boston got together to play a joke on Sam.

questions.text: Who gives Norm the Celtics coat on his birthday?
questions.explanation:
Kevin McHale.

	Kevin McHale hurts his ankle during a basketball game when a piece of the floor comes.

questions.text: When Sam asks Carla to get even with Hill, what does Carla do?
questions.explanation:
Sleeps with him.

	Sam: "How could you sleep with that evil little twit?"

questions.text: In "A Fine French Wine," who tries to marry Kelly?
questions.explanation:
Henri.

	Henri is played by Anthony Cistaro.

questions.text: What does Frasier seem to think won't happen if you don't mention it?
questions.explanation:
death.

	Frasier's funeral information gets mixed up with Sam's fertility information.

questions.text: Who played Sam and Rebecca's son (Sam Jr.) in "Go Mate"?
questions.explanation:
Ric Coy.

	Ric Coy once guest starred on "Beverly Hills, 90210."

questions.text: Who loses their pants, thanks to Frasier's low-self-esteem group?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Norm and Cliff convince Fraiser's group to pants Frasier because Frasier acts like he's so much better than the others.

questions.text: Who played Kelly's grandmother?
questions.explanation:
Celeste Holm.

	Celeste Holm played Hattie Greene in "Promised Land".

questions.text: Which one of Carla's sons wants to be a priest?
questions.explanation:
Gino.

	Gino was played by Josh Lozoff. He also played Logan in the movie "Clueless".

questions.text: What is Nanny G's phone number?
questions.explanation:
555-6792.

	Nanny G gives Frederick a doll that keeps playing the phone number over. Lilith is great in this episode, with her hatred of Frasier's first wife.

questions.text: What singer played Woody's cousin whom had a crush on Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Harry Connick, Jr.

	Harry Connick, Jr played Justin Matisse in "Hope Floats".

questions.text: Whose fault was it that the liquor license was not renewed?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam didn't pay the right postage on the stamp, so the renewal came back. So he blamed Rebecca and then found out it was indeed his fault.

questions.text: Complete this line by Woody, "My life's gone completely down the ________."
questions.explanation:
loo.

	Woody went to Europe with Kelly and her money started to change him.

questions.text: What is Lilith's overbearing mother's name?
questions.explanation:
Betty Sternin.

	Betty was played by Marilyn Cooper. She has done several Broadway shows. She is probably best known for her role on Broadway in "Woman of the Year".

questions.text: What is the name of Lilith's rat that Frasier loses?
questions.explanation:
Whiskers.

	For those of you who thought it was Whitey, that was the rat that died in an earlier season.

questions.text: What does Rebecca learn about Mark when he comes to visit?
questions.explanation:
He's gay.

	Mark was played by Harvey Fierstein. Fierstein is a great actor and can be seen in "Mrs. Doubtfire" where he plays Uncle Frank. He's currently (as of 2003) staring on Broadway in "Hairspray".

questions.text: What is Frank Carpaccio's nickname?
questions.explanation:
Angel Of Death.

	Frank "The Angel Of Death" Carpaccio was played by Harry Guardino.

questions.text: What talk show host guest starred on "Cheers"?
questions.explanation:
Johnny Carson.

	Doc Severinson also guest starred as himself in this episode.

questions.text: In "An Old-Fashioned Wedding" what happened to the minister?
options: He comes out of the closet
questions.explanation:
He died.

	After he dies, Kelly's Uncle Roger, has to do the wedding. When he's sober however he refuses to do it because he just got divorced. So they have to keep him drunk.
